segments.text: My name is Mary , and I will be your waitress tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , Mary . We have been looking forward to trying out this restaurant .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Before your main course , would you like to order an appetizer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , that sounds great . Where are your appetizers listed ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There is a special appetizer menu right here in the center of the table .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The chicken and cheese quesadilla looks good . Is that pretty good ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know , that is one of my favorites !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I'll take one order of that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You could choose another appetizer for half price to share .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perfect ! Please add on an order of onion rings .
segments.speaker: S2
